name: hyperapp-html
description: Html helpers for hyperapp and every `h`
author: Swizz

scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/html.dist.js -o dist/html.dist.js --mangle --compress warnings=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty -p relative --source-map dist/html.js.map
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
